quotes.words: If you want to be happy, be.
quotes.author: Leo Tolstoy

quotes.words: It's kind of fun to do the impossible
quotes.author: Walt Disney

quotes.words: Impossible is a word to be found only in the dictionary of fools.
quotes.author: Napoleon

quotes.words: Some cause happiness wherever they go, others whenever they go.
quotes.author: Oscar Wilde

quotes.words: A true man hates no one.
quotes.author: Napoleon

quotes.words: There is nothing impossible for him who will try.
quotes.author: Alexander the Great

quotes.words: The greatest lesson in life is to know that even fools are right sometimes.
quotes.author: Winston Churchill

quotes.words: Men freely believe that which they desire.
quotes.author: Julius Caesar

quotes.words: To speak another language is to have another soul.
quotes.author: Charlemagne

quotes.words: To speak another language is to have another soul.
quotes.author: Charlemagne

quotes.words: If you're lucky enough to do well, it's your responsibility to send the elevator back down.
quotes.author: Kevin Spacey
